pr_title: Metaprofile for Straumurinn ( xroad in Iceland )

timeline.message: Added Icelandic is_IS.UTF-8 locale support to ansible/roles/xroad-base/tasks/ubuntu.yml

Reverted "Added Icelandic is_IS.UTF-8 locale support to ansible/roles/xroad-base/tasks/ubuntu.yml"

This reverts commit 37912198473204cca2a8362c699d20007404aa09.
Initial metapackage for Straumurinn ( xroad in Iceland )

timeline.author: iluwatar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,31 @@
+# produce .elX dist tag on both centos and redhat
+%define dist %(/usr/lib/rpm/redhat/dist.sh)
+
+Name:               xroad-securityserver-is
+Version:            %{xroad_version}
+# release tag, e.g. 0.201508070816.el7 for snapshots and 1.el7 (for final releases)
+Release:            %{rel}%{?snapshot}%{?dist}
+Summary:            X-Road security server with Icelandic settings
+BuildArch:          noarch
+Group:              Applications/Internet
+License:            MIT
+Requires:           xroad-securityserver = %version-%release, xroad-addon-opmonitoring = %version-%release
+Conflicts:          xroad-centralserver
+
+%define src %{_topdir}/..
+
+%description
+This is meta package of X-Road security server with Finnish settings

timeline.bodyText: Here too, should say "Icelandic settings" in multiple places
timeline.author: iluwatar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -140,6 +140,13 @@ Depends: xroad-securityserver (=${binary:Version}), xroad-addon-opmonitoring (=$
 Description: X-Road security server with Finnish settings
  This is meta-package of X-Road security server with Finnish settings.
 
+Package: xroad-securityserver-is
+Conflicts: xroad-centralserver
+Architecture: all
+Depends: xroad-securityserver (=${binary:Version}), xroad-addon-opmonitoring (=${binary:Version})
+Description: X-Road security server with Icelandic settings
+ This is meta-package of X-Road security server with Finnish settings.

timeline.message: Fixed reference to Finnish, changed to Icelandic
